name: CommunityCreatedCalendar
0:
”Alexa ask global calendar is walmart open today?”
”Alexa ask global calendar walmart open on September 25 th”
”Alex Ask global calendar Is walmart located at Hamilton open next Monday?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: global calendar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill can be used to ask Alexa about holidays , hours of operations, special schedules of local businesses, educational institutions , government offices , museums etc. User our iPhone App AlexaAskRoger to create the calendar. You can create the calendar for any institution, like your school, your favorite restaurant etc and it can be used by every one

Enter the details about holidays, hours of operations etc of local businesses, schools etc using our companion iPhone app AlexaAskRoger. As an example add the Regular schedule , holiday schedule and Special schedule for Walmart located in Hamilton New Jersey using the AlexaAskRoger app. Then the holiday information can be queried as follows
 Walmart open today?
Walmart located at Hamilton open today
Walmart open tomorrow?
 Walmart open next Monday?
 Walmart open on September 25 th
and other similar queries
The skill will respond with answers like Walmart is closed today or 
Walmart is open tomorrow between 8:10 AM and 2:30 PM
This is a community effort like wikipedia. For example if you enter the holiday schedule of a local business using the iPhone app AlexaAskRoger, this information can be queried by any one using the Community Created Calendar skill set
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
